Class UI

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChoosingUI, GameOverUI, GamePlayUI, MenuUI, ResultsUI
    public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object

      • drawUI

        public abstract void drawUI​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch,
                            com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 mousePos,
                            float screenWidth,
                            float delta)
        This method draws UI elements that are not related to the player boat.
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch to draw to
        mousePos - The location of the mouse, necessary for buttons
        screenWidth - The width of the screen
        delta - The time passed since the last frame
        Since:
        1
